unnormalised: EduTech Buzz: Scholarship Portals - Your Ticket to Vidya!
normalised: Edu Tech Buzz: Scholarship Portals - Your Ticket to Vidya!

unnormalised: Hey students! Feeling the pinch after all that Diwali shopping? Scholarship portals are here to save the day! These nifty online platforms are connecting bright sparks like you with funding for your education. Think of them as matchmaking apps, but for your academic dreams!
normalised: Hey students! Feeling the pinch after all that Diwali shopping? Scholarship portals are here to save the day! These nifty online platforms are connecting bright sparks like you with funding for your education. Think of them as matchmaking apps, but for your academic dreams!

unnormalised: Forget scouring newspapers and college notice boards – sites like "Vidya Dhan" and "Shiksha Saarthi" are bringing scholarships from across India directly to your screen. Whether you're dreaming of IIT Delhi or a degree in fine arts, there's likely a scholarship for you.
normalised: Forget scouring newspapers and college notice boards – sites like "Vidya Dhan" and "Shiksha Saarthi" are bringing scholarships from across India directly to your screen. Whether you're dreaming of I I T Delhi or a degree in fine arts, there's likely a scholarship for you.

unnormalised: Many offer filters – state, caste, income, field of study - making the search way less overwhelming than tackling a plate of spicy biryani on an empty stomach. And, like a good plate of homemade Onam sadhya, the best part? They're often completely free!
normalised: Many offer filters – state, caste, income, field of study - making the search way less overwhelming than tackling a plate of spicy biryani on an empty stomach. And, like a good plate of homemade Onam sadhya, the best part? They're often completely free!

unnormalised: So, ditch the chai break and spend 30 minutes exploring these portals. That R. 50000 scholarship could be just what you need to make your academic goals a reality. Good luck, future engineers and doctors of India!
normalised: So, ditch the chai break and spend thirty minutes exploring these portals. That rupee fifty thousand scholarship could be just what you need to make your academic goals a reality. Good luck, future engineers and doctors of India!
